text: Oyoso arrā ga michibikou to o nozomi ni natta mono wa, isurāmu no tame ni sono mune o hiraku. Daga mayou ni makaseyou to o kangae ni natta mono ni wa, sono mune o marude ten ni noborou to suru ka no yō ni shime sebameru (mogaki kurushimeru). Ko no yō ni arrā wa, shinkō o kyohi suru mono ni chijoku o kuwae rareta
